forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun takes center stage, casting a gentle warmth across the streets, beckoning residents to bask in its embrace. The temperature hovers around a comfortable 65 degrees, though it may dip slightly as the day progresses. The invigorating west-southwest wind stirs, rustling tree leaves and carrying whispers of the sea, punctuated by occasional gusts, reminding all of the ever-changing nature of coastal weather. 

As evening approaches, the sky begins to don a cloak of soft gray, signaling a transition into a night that promises mostly cloudy skies, with lows slipping to around 56 degrees. The air feels fresh yet carries a slight chill, inviting layers—perhaps a light sweater or a shawl, perfect for evening strolls. With the backdrop of the gentle glow of the city lights reflected in the Bay, this is a splendid opportunity to explore local eateries or converse with friends over warm beverages in cozy cafes. A leisurely walk across the street or a visit to a favorite spot is highly encouraged, as the mood of the day suggests a serene, almost poetic quality to the unfolding evening.
